NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS
AeroWave Offers Unlimited Connectivity with $399/month Flat Fee AeroWave now offers two affordable plans: $399/month or $39.99/hour for unlimited data. Each plan offers the convenience of staying in touch on all personal devices from takeoff to touchdown. The monthly plan is a great choice for leisure users, while hourly provides the same level of connectivity for power users. Existing AeroWave customers can send an email to sales@bendixking.com <[[mailto:Sales@BendixKing.com?subject=AeroWave]]> to move to the new monthly flat fee plan!
We know you’re looking for something simple, easy to use, and mobile friendly, so we’ve done just that. What’s new:
- New images and Homepage layout for a better user experience. - New market categorizations. - New product categories and featured products. - New content such as blogs, news and events.
This new website design will leverage world-class technologies to provide our customers with a superior, single digital customer experience. Visit BendixKing.com <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/home]]> today!
THE MORE YOU KNOW. Product Videos. The sales team continues to add more “short format” product overviews to help you stay informed and better understand upgrade options for your cockpit.
Have a suggestion for a future video or webinar? Please reach out to Lisa Watmore lisa.watmore@honeywell.com <[[mailto:lisa.watmore@honeywell.com?subject=Product Videos]]> or to your sales manager.

Learn about this unit, including the panel planning process, installation tips and whether the AeroVue Touch might be the right choice for your next panel upgrade.
